name: Minigame Mania (simplyy, MintySimply)
description:
Minigame Mania is a game where you can play a ton of minigames with your friends. It's COMPLETELY free if you wanna try it out yourself, and it's super fun to play! The game supports Mac and Windows users, so it doesn't matter on WHAT device you're playing on to have fun! All you have to do is click the download link below, and enjoy!

I wanna give credit to my friend (which you can find here: https://mintysimply.itch.io) which helped me a lot with the art and also coding the game! Go check out her page above! :D

Games' still in development, only v0.1 out lol :/
